remarks: The adjoint of an operator belongs to the adjoint function's domain. (Note: the converse is dependent on our definition of function value, since it uses ~ ndmfv .)  (Contributed by NM, 19-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: dmadjrnb $p |- ( T e. dom adjh <-> ( adjh ` T ) e. dom adjh ) $.
